title: Marjorie Taylor Greene Says Her Daughters Swatted
text: Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene (R-GA) said Thursday the houses of both her daughters were swatted. â€œBoth my daughterâ€™s houses just got swatted today. Big thanks to the police who responded! We appreciate you and support you! Whoever is doing this, you are going to get caught and it wonâ€™t be funny to you anymore,â€ Greene said. Both my daughterâ€™s houses just got swatted today. Big thanks to the police who responded! We appreciate you and support you! Whoever is doing this, you are going to get caught and it wonâ€™t be funny to you anymore. [@FBI] â€” Rep. This is like the 8th time. On Christmas with my family here. My local police are the GREATEST and shouldnâ€™t have to deal with this. I appreciate them so much and my family and I are in joyous spirits celebrating the birth of our savior Jesus Christ!â€ Greene commented. I was just swatted. This is like the 8th time. On Christmas with my family here. My local police are the GREATEST and shouldnâ€™t have to deal with this. I appreciate them so much and my family and I are in joyous spirits celebrating the birth of our savior Jesus Christ! â€” Rep. He also says he would like to smash Pres Trumpâ€™s and Brianâ€™s heads on a curb,â€ Greene later said. I was swatted this morning on Christmas Day and a few days ago â€“ Thursday Dec 21st. we received this death threat where this man is saying I will be shot in the head and skinned to make a â€œparasolâ€ making a reference to Gein, who was a psychopath killer who would make things outâ€¦ [pic.twitter.com/iW8JvOSJLa] â€” Rep. Marjorie Taylor GreeneğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ (@RepMTG) [December 25, 2023] X users reacted to the news of Greeneâ€™s daughters being a swatting target: Swatting of conservatives will stop the moment when the FBI ceases being preoccupied with pursuing parents at school board meetings, Christians, pro-Lifers, and current regime political opponents and they will allocate their time and resources to finding those who abuse lawâ€¦ [https://t.co/OiRiLXwNhX] â€” I Meme Therefore I Am ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ (@ImMeme0) [December 28, 2023] This is so dangerous. Now they're going after her kids? [https://t.co/QAq37iK8xt] â€” Wendy Patterson (@wendyp4545) [December 28, 2023] Why is the FBI continuing to allow this to happen to a member of the House of Representatives? Is it because sheâ€™s a Republican that Bidenâ€™s administration isnâ€™t doing anything about these attempted murders on MTG and her family? Shame on you FBI. You stink! â€” Paul A. Szypula ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ (@Bubblebathgirl) [December 28, 2023] [Forbes](https://www.forbes.com/sites/mollybohannon/2023/12/25/marjorie-taylor-greene-reports-swatting-at-her-house-on-christmas/?utm_source=twitter&utm_medium=social&utm_campaign=forbes&utm_term=se-breaking&sh=13d1fcacb8b5) reports: Greene has been swatted in the past, including at least twice in August 2022, and posted on X in October 2022 that she had been swatted for â€œthe 6th time.â€ In that post, Greene called swatting â€œa very serious crime (in which) the caller wants to have their victim murdered by police,â€ and said it is â€œa giant abuse of police resources and time.â€ Swatting is rare, but it has occasionally resulted in death if police mount a large-scale response to a fake criminal call. Rep. [Brandon Williams](https://100percentfedup.com/another-gop-member-of-congress-swatted-on-christmas-day/) (R-NY) and Human Events Senior Editor [Jack Posobiec](https://100percentfedup.com/jack-posobiec-says-his-family-was-swatted-on-christmas-day/) have also been victims of recent swatting incidents.
